Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Yes, Heritrix comes with its own (patched) HTTPClient implementation.
Is th=
ere a way to override tomcats httpclient in this case, or should i run heri=
trix on another server to avoid conflict?
When i put patched httpClient in =
tomcat common lib dir i get DNS error, when its in webapp lib dir i get nos=
uchmethoderror(setCookieMap).



________________________________
 From: Bj=
arne Andersen <bja@...>
To: "archive-crawler@...=
m" <archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com> 
Sent: Monday, May 6, 2013 11:57 AM
Su=
bject: SV: [archive-crawler] Embed Heritrix 1.14.4.
 

Heritrix comes with =
its own (patched) HTTPClient implementation as far as I remember. So runnin=
g inside a tomcat you might have conflicting libs ?

best
Bjarne Andersen
N=
etarchive.dk
